advancement.root.title: Let's get into it
advancement.root.description: The brave new world (make sure to use the recipe book!)
advancement.final.title: That's Only The Beginning
advancement.get_a_branch.title: Going further
advancement.get_a_branch.description: Get some branches from the leaves or a dead bush
advancement.get_a_fiber.title: Feeling green
advancement.make_a_twine.title: Getting String Without Spiders
advancement.make_a_twine.description: Create a twine using three fibers
advancement.make_flint_shears.title: Sharpening
advancement.make_flint_shears.descriptio: Create flint shears using a twine and three flaked flints
advancement.make_sticks.title: A Stick
advancement.make_sticks.description: Make first sticks by cutting a branch with shears
advancement.make_a_gravel.title: First serious step
advancement.make_a_gravel.description: Find or form some gravel by jumping on a grass block
advancement.get_a_flint.title: Flintstone age
advancement.get_a_flint.description: Get a flint from a gravel
advancement.get_a_flaked_flint.title: Something broke
advancement.get_a_flaked_flint.descripti: Create a flaked flint by tapping with it on any kind of stone
advancement.make_a_flint_axe.title: The Lumberjack's Way
advancement.make_a_flint_axe.description: Make a flint axe using a stick, a twine and two flaked flints
advancement.make_a_flint_knife.title: Sharp Stick
advancement.make_a_flint_knife.descripti: Make a flint knife using a stick, a twine and two flaked flints
advancement.make_a_grass_mesh.title: A few little holes
advancement.make_a_grass_mesh.descriptio: Make a grass mesh using two sticks and twines
advancement.meet_the_flintstones.title: Meet the Flintstones
advancement.meet_the_flintstones.descrip: Obtain a stack of flint (you can use a grass mesh on a gravel by right clicking)
advancement.make_a_flint.title: Treasure hunt
advancement.make_a_flint.description: Get something special by sifting Gravel through Mesh (right clicking on gravel will get toy a flint)
advancement.make_a_flint_shovel.title: Mining gravel
advancement.make_a_flint_shovel.descript: Make a flint shovel using a stick, a flaked flint and a twine
advancement.get_a_log.title: A Tree Hater
advancement.get_a_log.description: Attack a tree with an axe until the log pops out
advancement.make_a_chopping_block.title: Chopping down
advancement.make_a_chopping_block.descri: Combine a log with an axe to make a chopping block
advancement.make_planks.title: Getting Wood
advancement.make_planks.description: Cut a log on the chopping block to get some planks
advancement.make_more_sticks.title: Wooden Goods
advancement.make_more_sticks.description: Make perfect sticks by chopping planks in the chopping block
advancement.make_a_flint_pickaxe.title: Mining
advancement.get_a_rock.title: Let it Rock
advancement.get_a_rock.description: Get some rocks with your pickaxe
advancement.get_a_cobblestone.title: Stone Age
advancement.make_a_cobblestone_hammer.de: Make a cobblestone hammer with a stick, a twine and two cobblestones
advancement.make_a_crafting_table.title: Benchmarking
advancement.make_a_crafting_table.descri: Construct and place a crafting table
advancement.get_a_clay_ball.title: Just a Clay
advancement.get_a_clay_ball.description: Get a clay ball with a shovel
advancement.make_a_fire.title: Fire miracle
advancement.make_a_fire.description: Make a fire by alternately clicking (left-right clicks) with sticks in both hands
advancement.get_a_brick.title: Brick Station
advancement.get_a_brick.description: Use a Clay ball on fire (left click) to get a Brick
advancement.get_a_charcoal.title: Fuel of life
advancement.get_a_charcoal.description: Use a Log on fire (left click) to get a Charcoal
advancement.make_a_firestriker.title: Light it up!
advancement.make_a_firestriker.descripti: Make a firestriker using a charcoal, a flint and two branches
advancement.make_a_furnace.title: Hot stuff
advancement.make_a_furnace.description: Create and place a furnace on crafting table using eight bricks and a firestriker
advancement.make_a_pot.title: Pot Planter
advancement.make_a_pot.description: Craft and place a flower pot. You can store items in it!
advancement.make_a_stone.title: Its original form
advancement.make_a_stone.description: Burn a cobblestone in the furnace to get a stone
advancement.make_a_barrel.title: Compact storage solution
advancement.barrelful_of_cobblestone.des: Mine 1728 cobblestone, place it in a barrel, then stand on it in victory
advancement.stone_goods.title: Stone goods
advancement.get_a_hide.title: Flayer
advancement.make_a_raw_hide.title: Raw Hide
advancement.make_a_raw_hide.description: Use a knife on the animal hide
advancement.make_a_salted_hide.title: Salted Hide
advancement.make_a_salted_hide.descripti: Salt a raw hide using a salt and a filled canteen
advancement.make_a_rack.title: Rack
advancement.make_a_rack.description: Create a rack with three cobblestones
advancement.get_a_dried_hide.title: Dried Hide
advancement.get_a_dried_hide.description: Dry the salted hide using a rack
advancement.make_a_tanned_hide.title: Wet Tanned Hide
advancement.make_a_tanned_hide.descripti: Soak and process the dried hide with a ground resin and a filled canteen
advancement.make_a_leather.title: Skin covering
advancement.make_a_leather.description: Obtain a leather by drying a wet tanned hide on the rack
advancement.make_a_stone_slab.title: Square Stone Wheel
advancement.make_a_grindstone.title: Grindstone
advancement.make_a_grindstone.descriptio: Create and place a grindstone using a smooth stone, planks and sticks
advancement.get_a_bark.title: Tree Bark
advancement.get_a_bark.description: Get some bark from a tree using an axe (right clicking on logs)
advancement.make_a_ground_resin.title: Ground Resin
advancement.make_a_ground_resin.descript: Grind a bark into the ground resin using a grindstone
advancement.make_a_smooth_stone.title: Smooth, dude!
advancement.make_a_smooth_stone.descript: Smelt normal stone further into smooth stone
advancement.make_a_blast_furnace.title: Blast it!
advancement.make_a_blast_furnace.descrip: Upgrade your furnace to a blast furnace and place it for smelting more materials
advancement.get_an_iron_lump.title: Iron Lump
advancement.get_an_iron_lump.description: Obtain some iron lumps by breaking the iron ore
advancement.get_a_poor_iron_nugget.title: Not Chicken McNuggets?
advancement.get_a_poor_iron_nugget.descr: Get a poor iron nugget by smelting iron lumps using blast furnace
advancement.make_a_poor_iron_ingot.title: Acquire Hardware
advancement.make_a_poor_iron_ingot.descr: Create a poor iron ingot with poor iron nuggets
advancement.make_a_bucket.title: Iron Bucket
advancement.make_a_bucket.description: Create a bucket using poor iron ingots
advancement.make_a_chest.title: Stationary Storage
advancement.make_a_chest.description: Craft and place down a chest using planks and a poor iron ingot for storing your items
advancement.get_a_sandstone.title: Sandy Stone
Not really, but it looks cool! Also, make a red sandstone hammer.
advancement.make_iron_shears.title: Have a Shearful Day
advancement.watering.title: Water business
advancement.watering.description: Rivers of tears, puddles of dreams
advancement.first_drink.title: Thirst never sleeps
advancement.first_drink.description: Drink some water (left click with a bare hand on a water source while laying (double Shift))
advancement.sugar_sugar.title: Sugar, sugar
advancement.sugar_sugar.description: Harvest some sugar cane from a river or an ocean
advancement.get_an_ink_sac.title: It's full of ink
advancement.get_an_ink_sac.description: Obtain some ink from hunting a squid
advancement.get_a_water_bucket.title: Water Bucket
advancement.get_a_salt.title: Salt on the wounds
advancement.get_a_salt.description: Get some salt by evaporating a water bucket in a furnace
advancement.get_a_water_gun.title: Firefighting
advancement.get_a_water_gun.description: Get and fill the water gun
advancement.get_a_rotten_flesh.title: Rotten Flesh
advancement.get_a_rotten_flesh.descripti: Get some rotten flesh from zombies
advancement.make_a_canteen.title: Canteen
advancement.make_a_canteen.description: Use an ink sac, rotten flash and twines for creating a canteen
advancement.make_a_paper.title: Paper factory
advancement.make_a_paper.description: Create a paper from sugar canes
advancement.make_a_charcoal_filter.title: Filtration
advancement.make_a_charcoal_filter.descr: Create a charcoal filter using charcoals and a paper
advancement.purified_water.title: A sip of delicious water
advancement.purified_water.description: Clean the water in your canteen with a filter
advancement.get_leaves.title: Trimming the Treetops
advancement.get_leaves.description: Use shears to obtain leaf blocks
advancement.get_a_dead_bush.title: Yay! Deadbush!
advancement.get_a_dead_bush.description: Get a deadbush and become happy
advancement.make_a_saddle.title: Saddle
advancement.pathways.title: Pathways
advancement.pathways.description: Use a shovel to create grass paths
advancement.rock_collection.title: Rock Collection
advancement.rock_collection.description: Create every type of primitive stone
advancement.get_a_tin_cluster.title: Tin Cluster
advancement.get_a_tin_cluster.descriptio: Get a tin cluster. Usually found in andesite an diorite.
advancement.get_a_copper_cluster.title: Copper Cluster
advancement.get_a_copper_cluster.descrip: Get a copper cluster. Usually found in granite.
advancement.get_a_tin_bucket.title: Molten Tin Bucket
advancement.get_a_tin_bucket.description: Convert nine tin clusters into fluid using a blast furnace
advancement.get_a_copper_bucket.title: Molten Copper Bucket
advancement.get_a_copper_bucket.descript: Convert nine copper clusters into fluid using a blast furnace
advancement.make_leather_gloves.title: Frozen Hands
advancement.make_leather_gloves.descript: Create a pair of leather gloves
advancement.make_a_stone_tool.title: Stone Age
advancement.make_a_stone_tool.descriptio: Create stone instrument on crafting table using sticks, stones and a twine
advancement.get_a_lava_bucket.title: Iron Logic
advancement.get_a_lava_bucket.descriptio: Fill your iron bucket with lava. It's fine, just don't forget to wear some gloves!
advancement.expelliarmus.title: Expelliarmus!
advancement.expelliarmus.description: Hit a mob with your good stick
advancement.fossil_fuel.title: Fossil Fuel
advancement.coal_miner.title: Coal Miner
advancement.master_coal_miner.title: Coal Business
advancement.master_coal_miner.descriptio: Mine enough coal to make a stack of coal blocks
